panels.title: CPU usage by shards for database
Database sum redis active defrag running
redis_crdt_peer_peer_state != 1.  [ initialized: 0, online: 1, wait_fullsync: 2, fullsync: 3, fullsync_ack: 4, closed: 5 ]

targets.expr: (bdb_big_fetch_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid"} + bdb_big_write_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid"} + bdb_big_del_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid"}) / (bdb_big_fetch_flash{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid"} + bdb_big_write_flash{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid"} + bdb_big_del_flash{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid"} + bdb_big_fetch_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid"} + bdb_big_write_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid"} + bdb_big_del_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid"}) > 0

panels.description: Positive is RAM, Negative is Flash

targets.legendFormat: User RAM Ops for Redis - Replica:{{crdt_replica_id}}
User Flash Ops for Redis - Replica:{{crdt_replica_id}}

panels.title: BDB RAM:Flash access ratio

panels.description: Positive is RAM, Negative is Flash

targets.legendFormat: RAM Ops for Redis - Replica:{{crdt_replica_id}} - redis:{{redis}}
Flash Ops for Redis - Replica:{{crdt_replica_id}} - redis:{{redis}}

panels.title: RAM:Flash access ratio
BDB sum redis wait busy key / $aggregation
BDB sum redis big inst avg read io queue
BDB sum redis big inst avg write io queue

objects in ram (sum of all master shards) - Replica:{{crdt_replica_id}}

targets.expr: topk(1, min(max(redis_bigdb0_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid",role="slave"} or redis_bigdb_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid",role="slave"}) by (redis,bdb,crdt_replica_id) < on(crdt_replica_id,bdb,redis) redis_db0_keys{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid",role="slave"} ) by (bdb, redis,crdt_replica_id) * -1) * -1
targets.legendFormat: lowest number of values in ram per slave shard - redis:{{redis}} - Replica:{{crdt_replica_id}}

targets.expr: topk(1, min(max(redis_bigdb0_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid",role="master"} or redis_bigdb_ram{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid",role="master"}) by (redis,bdb,crdt_replica_id) < on(crdt_replica_id,bdb,redis) redis_db0_keys{crdt_guid="$crdt_guid",role="master"}) by (bdb, redis,crdt_replica_id) * -1) * -1
targets.legendFormat: lowest number of values in ram per master shard  - redis:{{redis}} - Replica:{{crdt_replica_id}}
